schema.description: 智能接入网关实例所属的地域ID。
要绑定的边界路由器实例ID。
要绑定的边界路由器实例所属的地域ID。
智能接入网关实例所属阿里云账号（主账号）ID。

400.errorMessage: You are not authorized to operate on the specified resource.
The specified VBR instance is invalid. You must specify a VBR instance that is associated with an ECC instance.
You cannot bind an SAG software instance with a VBR instance.
Bind the specified VBR instance to a CEN instance first.
The specified SAG instance is bound to another VBR instance. Unbind them first.
The specified SAG instance is already used as a leased line backup.
The specified VBR instance is bound to another SAG instance. Unbind them first.
Bind the specified CCN instance to a CEN instance first.

403.errorMessage: User not authorized to operate on the specified resource.
The specified smart access gateway instance id is invalid.
The specified smart access gateway has not bound CCN; please bind CCN first.
The current edition of the smart access gateway does not support this feature.
The subnet of the gateway conflicts with the VBR. Create a backup relationship first.
